Title: WPF SendKeys
Description: Provides SendKeys support for WPF UIElements (for in-process UI testing)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Provides SendKeys support for WPF UIElements (for in-process UI testing)

Warning: this library will be of little use for most people, and it is NOT a replacement for the WinForms SendKeys functionality.
Read more at: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kirillosenkov/archive/2010/07/09/wpf-sendkeys-or-mocking-the-keyboard-in-wpf.aspx
